item.title: [508] item on item [508]
item.dc:creator: @purexxstr purexxstr
item.description:
@purexxstr wrote:

hey everyone,
I have just started to code my first ever 508.

and I am having a bit of trouble with item on item.
here is the code.

if (itemUsed == 11710 && usedWith == 11712 || itemUsed == 11710 && usedWith == 111712) { if(player.skillLvl[13] >= 80) { pi.deleteItem(player, 11712, pi.deleteItem(player, 11712, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11712), 1); pi.addItem(player, 11686, 1); player.addSkillXP(172*player.skillLvl[12] ,100); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "you have just smithed a godsword shard."); }

:S
And Im having a bit of trouble finding a compiler, if you could include one in the comments that would be great!

thanks.
